verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] nominated Chicago businessman and GOP donor Ron Gidwitz to serve as U.S. ambassador to Belgium .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: nominated] [ARG1: Chicago businessman and GOP donor Ron Gidwitz] [ARG2: to serve as U.S. ambassador to Belgium] .
President Donald Trump has nominated [ARG0: Chicago businessman and GOP donor Ron Gidwitz] to [V: serve] [ARG1: as U.S. ambassador to Belgium] .
